an5.141:4.3: Datvā avajānāti, saṃvāsena avajānāti, ādheyyamukho hoti, lolo hoti, mando momūho hoti.
an5.141:5.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo datvā avajānāti.
an5.141:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṃ saṃvasati dve vā tīṇi vā vassāni.
an5.141:6.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo saṃvāsena avajānāti.
an5.141:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo parassa vaṇṇe vā avaṇṇe vā bhāsiyamāne taṃ khippaññeva adhimuccitā hoti.
an5.141:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ādheyyamukho hoti.
an5.141:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ittarasaddho hoti ittarabhattī ittarapemo ittarappasādo.
an5.141:8.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo lolo hoti.
an5.141:9.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo mando momūho hoti?
an5.141:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kusalākusale dhamme na jānāti, sāvajjānavajje dhamme na jānāti, hīnappaṇīte dhamme na jānāti, kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme na jānāti.
an5.141:9.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo mando momūho hoti.
an5.141:9.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
